This group meets to fellowship and share our journey as we follow Yahshua.

Whether you're looking to go deeper into ministry, develop your voice, dive deeper into your prayer life, or just experience the love that Yahshua has for you, this group is about going to the next level. Join us to chat, to learn, and to meet other tech enthusiasts!

results.description: So many us suffer from the Sex and Porn Addiction. Some of us may have recovered with the grace of God. Regardless of you are a married or unmarried, religious or non-religious the harm from sex and porn addiction affect every one. It destroys our career, our families, education and make us slaves of this invisible drug.
results.name: Sex and Porn Addiction Recovery Meetup

results.description:
For many years, several places throughout the world have captivated people's imagination with stories of fantastic healings and spiritual phenomenon brought about by the faculty of mediumship.  This group will explore many aspects of mediumship, especially as it relates to healing.  

We will be holding regular healing circles with a variety of gifted mediums and exploring the concept of what is known in Brazil and several other places around the world as "current."  "Sitting in current" is a special type of focused collaborative meditation that can help to augment and amplify the work of mediumship, and at times also help with healing and spiritual development.   It is widely used in Brazil and other areas around the world that work with healing mediumship.

A group of us familiar with this type of work have been meeting weekly for a while, and we are now looking to grow the circle.   We will look to hold events regularly, as consistency is a component of creating a strong and successful current, and all are welcome, as current seems to grow with larger numbers of people, and the whole does seem to be greater than the sum of its parts.

Anyone with an interest in mediumship and healing is welcome.  Those who are sensitive to energy, clairvoyant, empathic and interested in energy work may particularly find this work of interest.
results.name: New York Healing and Mediumship Circle

topics.name: Best Practices of Doing Business in China

results.description:
Every year, more and more Chinese people are visiting the US for leisure, studies, business and investments. Is your business ready to attract Chinese customers from China? This meet-up group is a group that discusses strategies on how to attract Chinese customers and various international marketing channels 

What this meetup group is about

The group is about learning about different strategies to market to Chinese visitors from China.

Who should join

An idea member should be someone works with a company that is interested in marketing services or products to Chinese visitors from China.

Why you should join

You should join the group because you will meet other members with similar interest in attracting Chinese visitors and you will hear first-hand insight about marketing trends in China. Learn about different technologies that are trending in China and you can utilize these technologies in effective marketing. 

What you can expect

You can expect discussion meetings in which people would share about the business they are in and the experience people have with marketing internationally.

Click to learn more about this unique marketing channel.
results.name: How to Attract Customers from China (NYC)

results.description: This group is intended for people that are looking for afterwork or school activities that don't revolve around alcohol or drugs. Its a group for discussing anything about topics that you might be interested to learn and have questions about regardless of your level of knowledge or expertise. We encourage people with a desire to learn and anyone with a desire to share their knowledge in a kind a gentle way to others that stimulates thought and empowers those that want to learn but are insecure and feel embarrassed to ask questions in other settings such as school or work who might feel like they are being judged for their lack of understanding. We encourage open discussions and one on one break out sessions for those that might have answers and those that are seeking answer to connect. This group is meant as an alternative to the anxiety and excitement that one might feel after work or school that sometimes drives them to a place to drink or do drugs and instead replaces that excitement with something more productive safe and equally as exciting to explore and learn about all the things you alway wanted to know about but felt to shy, or dumb or whatever else type of label you might have mistakenly given yourself just for missing some knowledge. We encourage anyone to join the group that might want to just talk learn or teach. The group will start with a round table of questions of what members want to discuss and then break out sessions of those who can provide answers or feedback or just going into discovery modes for ourselves and with our peers that share a desire for the same information. Topics can include anything from order of operations in a basic algebra class to algorithm analysis about space time complexity in a computer system. Nothing small or large is off table. The only rule is to be kind and to give help where you feel you can with out a feeling of self righteousness for those who know or shyness and pride from those who don't. Every one is welcome and I hope to see you soon.
results.name: North Bergen Learners and Educators Looking for Excitement

Calling all Nigerians, Ghanaians, and all my African people. I cannot believe that there are no African meetup groups here in Central Jersey when there are tons of Africans about. Anytime I have a craving to socialize with my people, I have to travel all the way to NYC. I think it's about time we made our own group here :-)

My goal is to create a space where Africans can connect with one another. Perhaps you'd meet someone from your hometown, or find someone who will go with you to African restaurants or dance with at The Shrine. The possibilities are endless.

We will meet at least once a month to socialize.

The empowerment of LATINAS continues to grow with ALL WOMEN in this nation, as a powerful body with the ability to have a positive global and economic impact. We support of all underrepresented groups in an inclusive spirit. Organizationally, our goal is to lead from the TOP-DOWN. results.description:
Welcome! My name is Jacqueline. I am a certified RYT- 200 yoga instructor. If you are a beginner, you can start from where you are. I provide a compassionate, non- competitive learning environment for beginners and experienced practitioners. Attention to detail is emphasized to ensure proper alignment and teach good habits. A good amount of pranayama ( breathing techniques) and meditation are taught which adhere to the traditional practice. Modifications are provided which is ideal but, not limited to persons with injuries. Look forward to becoming more flexible, stronger, calmer and being in community with like- minded people who just want to feel good. If you want to join this group it's because you are truly interested in developing or deepening a yoga practice and to be in community with others. You are committed to attending classes on a regular basis, as this is the only manner to truly attain mental, physical and emotional benefits.

 Yoga classes will be held twice a week, Mondays @ 7:15 p.m. and Thursday @ 9:00 a.m. in Dumont. There is a possibility for classes to be held in Ridgewood as well. Classes will be running from June 13 to August 4th and resume in September. No class July 4th but there will be class July 5th.


 All students must sign a waiver before taking a class.

The first class is free!

Classes are 75 minutes.

 1 class drop in $ 20.00

 6 class package ( one class per/ week)- $ 90.00

 12 class package ( two classes per/week)- $ 160.00

Cash payment.

Class packages have expiration. Please be aware, these dates cannot be extended.

 Bring a mat, water and towel.

Props will be provided.

A few rules:

-Please use a facial photo in your profile.

- I need to be able to recognize you for classes.

 -Please be considerate when you RSVP. If something comes up, change your RSVP. No- shows are inconsiderate.

- After 3 no- shows, you will be removed from the group.

-In active members are removed from the group after 3 months of no activity.

- Please arrive 5- 10 minutes early to set up, sign in ,etc.

- Please turn cell phones off.

 Thank you in advance and I look forward to meeting you!
results.name: New Milford/ Dumont Yoga

results.description:
Are you ready for singing? Crying? Singing while crying?

Come join us!

I'm hoping this meetup will become a place for all fans of Steven Universe to get together and share thoughts, ideas, feelings, theories and -- yes, Garnet -- love. We can sip coffee while discussing The Great Diamond Authority. We can go out for Together Breakfasts. We can swap art, debate characters, plan cosplay, rewatch episodes... but, most of all, we can have fun!

We throw massive house parties at our event locations, host outdoor activities and sporting events, Backyard BBQ's, and ladies nights in.
results.name: Young Singles Parties, mixers, events

results.description:
FITNESS AND PHILOSOPHY


Bringing Together What Was Never Meant To Be Apart

Meditation - Exercise – Healthy Eating – Philosophy – Meaningful Connection

“It matters that you make healthy choices every day. It matters that you live your life in the moment. It matters that you love and that you care about becoming the best human being you can be.”


THE PROGRAM 

PART ONE 

· Be Present - An Inner Moment Experience 

05 minute meditation. This is to enhance mindfulness during exercise and conversation.
At the end of the meditation, you will randomly select a piece of paper with a secret phrase or question. This is your mental workout during the exercise session. Later, you will comment about the phrase or question you've received.


PART TWO 


· Moving with the Moment.
50 minute Workout. Conditioning and interval training - boot camp style exercise.
You will be going over a circuit routine, a series of bodyweight exercises, from squats to ab work, to resistance band stretch to TRX rows. You will follow your own rhythm, strength and capabilities while I make sure you are motivated and performing the exercises with good form. This routine is tailored to anyone without injuries. 


PART THREE 

· Healthy Eating Awareness and Open Discussion of Ethics and “How to Live."
1 hour.
- A healthy snack moment: You’re welcome to ask any question about nutrition for weight loss or muscle building. (snack provided)
- A philosophical moment: Each member will read the phrase that was given in the beginning of event and be asked to comment on it. The group will be encouraged to explore and expand on this comment.
P.S. Philosophical conversation is based on Stoicism, but all kind of reflective topics, ideas and questions are welcome!


PART FOUR 


· Stay Present Question and Quote
A final reminder to live each and every moment the healthiest way possible.


THE GOAL
Make true connection with the nature of what is important in life:
1- Your physical and mental health.
2- The cultivation of good relationships.
3- The appreciation of beauty in nature and art.
4- The drive and courage to do what is right and healthy for money.
5- Trust the notion that everything happens for a good reason. 


"I believe that LIFE is a compelling gift and that a mysterious CREATOR brought us here to be connected in a meaningful and positive way."


 P.S.: This event is suited for people in the pursuit of holistic wellbeing at all levels of fitness.


www.VALERIAFITNESS.com
results.name: Fitness and Philosophy Manhattan East Side

There are usually nets available between Edwards Blvd. and Riverside Blvd. and we have boundary lines.  These are not recreational or beginner level type games.  We are only looking for Intermediate to Advanced players that are able to consistently bump, set and spike and have previous experience and have a clear understanding of the rules and strategy.  We usually drive from the Bronx and depending on the number of people and where you could meet us we could possibly assist you with a ride to/from the beach if you do not own a car and do not feel like taking the train all the way out to Long Beach.  Please reach out to me if you have any questions, text or call Carlos @ 917-355-5252

results.description:
Ninhao, 

 We want to help people who want to learn Mandarin (Chinese/Putonghua) by the most efficient and effective means. Welcome to our study group in the afternoon on Saturdays. Our group does not only focus on exchange but we have at least a native tutor to deliver lessons, share some effective methods to learn Mandarin. We have successfully helped a Korean friend to pass Hanyu Shuipin Kaoshi (HSK) Level 6, which is the highest level of the Chinese proficiency test, and a Hong Kong lady to pass Putonghua Shuipin Ceshi (PSC) 89.5 points, now it’s your turn to make a difference. We sincerely invite you to attend our Meetup Groups. 

 Group information: 

(Beginner Level) 1. 11:00am ~ 12:00pm (Sat) 2. 1:00pm ~ 2:00pm (Sat) 

Achievement: Pinyin & simple conversation, grammar, writing, etc. 

(Advanced Mandarin) 1. 2:30pm ~ 3:30pm (Sat) 2. 4:30pm ~ 5:30pm (Sat) 

Achievement: Business conversation, Corporate Mandarin, etc. 

(Fees for Meetup) For the first Putonghua class in Meetup, no need to pay any fees. For the second and future Putonghua classes, US$10/person/class is needed. Free materials are available. And the total number of attendants is at most 8. 

Address: Water St @ Broad (inside) 1 New York Plaza New York, NY 10004 

Google map: https://goo.gl/maps/AB3x3xoATGm

Jiayou~! 

Raymond IP

Contact Tango +1 (413) 471-9981
results.name: New York Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup

Ladies 20's and 30's join if you have fallen into adult coloring or think you would enjoy it & want to meet new friends. Locations TBD but will be in the city. Activities include: movie nights meet ups in Northern NJ or NYC, coffeehouse or dinner gatherings. Come meet your new friends and kinsmen.

results.description:
Hello Everyone,

I am Ashish, together with my family I moved into NJ in 2012. Family became an important part of my life as me and my wife welcomed our first baby boy and then a baby girl. My wife and I have been living in the state for last 12 years or so. But due to moving around and there, we are looking to expand our social reach and our immediate circle of friends and just fun people to hang out with.

I see many many focused group for desis and Indian alike. But then they all end up being a group where especially when you are a new parents or a person who is trying to explore American and other cultures around run into some walls! Simple because everyone in the group is too much focused on being desi and doing desi stuffs. Don't get me wrong but I love to do that from time to time but as someone living in a country other then India, we need to adapt to that culture as well. That is why the name "Fusion Desi"!!

Now, who we are looking for?
1. If you recently moved into the tri state area and love to explore it on your convenience time, then join in! Don't worry, we know that you have family to take care so we won't plan the event in a blind!

2. Since we are a new parents, we welcome same however, we also understand that sometime living kids with nanny is the best thing to do!! So we got your back.

3. We enjoy dressing up but staying classy. So like minded folks always welcomed!!

4. Lastly, as the group gets bigger and more interesting we will defiantly try to expand the taste of the group with various types events voted by the members!! For a starter, since this is a new group we are hoping that we will have enough people very soon to take and advantage of the beautiful weather we are having. We are hoping that we will be able to plan welcome dinner for the group member at a group members home or at a upscale dinner place!! So, what you are waiting for then? Get into the fusion now!

- Ashish Patel
results.name: The Fusion Desi Group

results.description:
We all know being single in NYC is the worst but being single in Queens doesn't have to be!

With so many cool things to do in our own neighborhood, why not meet the lovely people who live down the block? This group exists for everyone single who has gone on bad first dates in Brooklyn. We deserve better. Meetups will typically include a happy hour / cocktail hour before an engaging event or activity. 

We won't stuff you into a movie theater and expect you to find love. Let's mix, mingle, and have fun shall we?!

results.description:
VR is blowing up right now! The space is expected to grow into a $150 billion dollar industry by 2020. Oculus' first investment was $5,000 that went to create a Kickstarter campaign. Two years later and it has over a billon dollars in investments. In addition to Oculus over 764 million has been invested in VR and AR startups by over 166 distinct investors. It is a trend that is showing signs of continued acceleration, which means big things for the industry going forward.

At VR INVEST developers and companies pitch to a panel of experienced investors in Seed+ stage startups that help them grow their business.  Hardware, software and content companies are considered for funding.

VR Invest serves the founders by supporting them with strategic mentoring, fundraising and direct investment, hiring, introductions and work space.

If you are a VR or AG reality company and would like to pitch to investors send us your pitch deck and any other information on your company.

If you are a investor send us a cover letter with information on your investments.

To submit send email to: jonathansarno@me.com
results.name: VR INVEST !

results.description:
This is the group you want to join if you are in Business or about to start one and you are all about 'Getting It Done.' results.description:
Have you ever asked yourself what your purpose in this life is? <br>What If I told you the answer is within you? and only you can dive deep inside your soul to find your true purpose ? That your 9-5 job, your debts, your "worries" and the law you abide by everyday is just part of a big illusion? <br>What if I proved to you that we are indeed living in a matrix , that we shape our " reality " with our thoughts? <br>What If I told you about the masterminds behind our everyday illusion of what we call "living", about the ones who enslaved us in a monetary never ending scheme where "freedom" and the " American Dream " is no longer our truth but the biggest lie they programmed us to believe through media?

"How foolish it is for material-minded man to allow such vulnerable theories as those of a mechanistic universe to deprive him of the vast spiritual resources of the personal experience of true religion. Facts never quarrel with real spiritual faith; theories may. Better that science should be devoted to the destruction of superstition rather than attempting the overthrow of religious faith – human belief in spiritual realities and divine values"

Would it be to hard to believe that they have limited our true mind potential ever since we were born in such a perfect way that we have forgotten who we are and where we come from?

If any of this questions made your mind wander, you belong here. Its time to rewrite our future by making the best of our present! <br>Lets be one, lets unlock the limitless powers within us, without US, their puppet show will no longer work! LETS STAND UP FOR A BETTER YOU, A BETTER TOMORROW, A GREENER EARTH.

CREATE AN UTOPIA IN YOUR MIND AND YOU WILL NEVER SEE LIFE IN DARK COLORS AGAIN. The only God there is is the one within yourself! Lets unlearn what they have taught us. Lets free our mind.
results.name: Conciousness And Spiritual Ascension

Aren't we all tired of swiping online already? Online dating often results in a high conversion rate but low engagement rate. Lets solve this by meeting in person and having some fun in a casual, no-pressure environment!! #Bringconversationback

I created Lace-Up! to encourage singles to engage in person over a short run in Central Park followed by a meet and greet. This is a one hour, low-time commitment, stay as long as you would like and then carry on with your Saturday errands!

The mix of men and women is approximately between the ages of 30-40.

Date: Saturday, June 11th

results.description:
Heartfulness is a way of living. A simple and practical way to experience the heart’s unlimited resources. In mindfulness we still the mind and in heartfulness we fill the heart. Whether you are seeking relaxation, an individual meditation practice, or the deepest connection to your inner being, Heartfulness Iselin, NJ welcomes you.

Heartfulness Meditation is a simple, practical technique that you can use alongside to any other form of yoga, meditation or spiritual practice. In a few minutes, you will learn how to truly relax and feel the lightness and joy of your true nature. You don’t need to know how to meditate or to believe in a particular system or philosophy. The Heartfulness technique shows us to gently turn our attention towards our heart and experience that inner presence for ourselves.

We are a global not-for-profit organization with the mission of uplifting the hearts of the communities we serve.

All teaching and methods are free.

Please visit our international site: www.heartfulness.org
results.name: Learn to Meditate -  Iselin

results.description: Have you ever wondered what your life would be like if you were truly fearless? What would you really be able to do if you felt more confident, courageous and comfortable in your own skin? How would you feel about yourself if you no longer beat yourself up about the decisions you made, or didn’t make? I have good news: There’s nothing wrong with you. It’s just fear. Fear that is subtle, insidious and tricky. And we want to help you master it. It doesn’t matter how successful you already are, or how many challenges you’ve faced, everyone deals with fear. It’s in our biology. But just because we were born with it, doesn’t mean it has to run our lives. Fearless Living has created a pathway for you to become awake to a new way of seeing the world, a world that supports you, loves you and guides you. Oprah says, “Everyone needs Fearless Living." Imagine having the courage and the confidence to make new decisions for your life. Imagine having a clear set of guidelines and principles so you no longer repeat the patterns of the past. Imagine having support to show you how to use these new guidelines and tools in the life you have right now. Because Fearless Living isn’t about jumping out of a plane, it’s about jumping into life..fully, completely, authentically. And not in any woo-woo way (not that we don’t love some woo-woo), but rather, in practical, grounded, down to earth ways that work. Fearless Living has been tested and refined by thousands of people who have used it to change their lives. Fearless Living was developed by Rhonda Britten, an Emmy Award-winner, repeat Oprah guest, Tedx Speaker, Huffington Post Blogger, 4x bestselling author and the first life coach on television in the world. She’s changed lives in over 600 episodes of reality television and is most well-known for her work on the hit daytime NBC show, “Starting Over.” Named “America’s Favorite Life Coach,” she has devoted her life to helping people master their emotional fears: fear of rejection, fear of failure, fear of success, fear of loss, etc. This Meetup Group is based on Rhonda’s bestselling book, “Fearless Living.” Rhonda says, “No one can be fearless alone” and that’s why I invite you to join me for this shake-up-your-life meet up group. My commitment to you is I will show you what’s worked for me and for thousands of people who want to leave fear in the dust. If you’re ready to master anything holding you back so you can go anywhere, do anything, meet anyone, sign up today. I look forward to meeting you!
results.name: Fearless Living NYC

topics.name: BNI - Business based on professional relationships
BNI - world's best business referral organization

results.description:
If you're on meetup.com, chances are you know the importance of networking to generate new business. Networking leads to business referrals which are the fastest way to grow your business. 

Over 98% of businesses get business from referrals, yet only 3% of those businesses have a plan to consistently get those referrals. Are you ready to join the 3%? 

For 30 years BNI has used a simple but elegant philosophy that exemplifies membership, "Givers Gain."  By helping other members grow their business those same members will, in turn, help you grow your business.  In 2014 BNI members passed 6.6 million referrals that generated an amazing $8.6 billion worth of closed business.  

Whether you're new to BNI or have some experience, chances are you've never seen anything like Chapter 27 before. We're highly motivated, enthusiastic and generous professionals that genuinely care about each other and growing each others business from consistent warm referrals. Our members span from fields as diverse as real estate, legal, tech, marketing, finance, and health and wellness. We have power teams that can take you and your business to that next level.  

Best of all, we only allow one person per profession.  If your profession isn't yet represented in our chapter, you could quickly become the go-to guy or gal. Imagine what it’s like having hungry salespeople looking for new business for you around the clock.

Are you our next success story? RSVP to our next meeting (Wednesdays at 7:00AM at Club 101) and see for yourself how BNI can change your business and your life for the better.

Current Location: 
Club 101 
101 Park Avenue 
New York, NY  

Cost: $20/visitor 

The meeting starts at 7:15am and is officially over at 8:45am. 

You will need to bring 30+ business cards to pass to everyone in the room.  You will also need to be prepared to tell the room who you are, what you do, and who a perfect referral for you would be.  The more specific you are in asking for the referral the greater chance you have in receiving that life changing referral on the spot.
results.name: BNI 27 - Business Before Breakfast - NYC Networking

Are you interested in learning Gracie self-defense Jiu Jitsu?

All you need is:

• To keep it fun & light;

• A shower before you come;

• Not weigh more than 200 lbs;

• T-shirt;

• Shorts (with no zippers, buttons, belts or scratchy stuff) compression, gym, board;

• Trimmed nails.

If you already know self-defense JJ, that's great too.

The grappling mats are 10'x10'.

My goal is to find guys in the Newark area interested in Gracie self-defense Jiu Jitsu. In other words, be a cooperative, training partner versus an opponent. I already have enough opponents at work and in life. So when I do JJ, I'm looking for buddies, partners and playmates.

If you're looking for sport or tournament Jiu Jitsu, this is NOT the meetup for you.

topics.name: Dancing and Exercising to Amazing Music

results.description:
Are you looking for a workout that would make you feel excited to wake up for? Are you looking for a workout that will leave you smiling and happy? Join my POP Pilates class for a fun, sweaty workout! No need for dance or Pilates experience!

ALL levels welcome! 

What is POP Pilates? POP Pilates® is an incredible fusion of ab-chiseling and total body defining moves choreographed to your favorite hits. This fun mat-based workout challenges students to rhythmically flow from one exercise to the next, developing a rock solid core while leaving no muscle untouched. This format takes classical Pilates to the next level like you’ve never seen before.

How is POP Pilates Different than Pilates?

While POP Pilates® moves all originate from classical Pilates, the class design, relationship with music, sequencing and reps, differ from reformer classes and traditional mat classes. The fundamentals of breathing, core engagement and powerhouse-based movements are shared, however, the emphasis on moving to the beat of pop music is what makes POP Pilates® so unique. Participants love that each 55 min. class is like a “dance on the mat.”
results.name: POP Pilates with Tia

results.description: This meetup is for people of all faith backgrounds and ethnicities who are looking for sanity and reason surrounding the circumcision issue. We are unabashedly and proudly in favor of male circumcision. For our Jewish and Muslim members, we support the ritual as part of those religious traditions. And we also want to share the health / safe-sex benefits of the procedure for all males.   We also want to have a social component, to hold events that are fun, where people can get together without having to worry about protests, shouting matches, and all the things that sometimes happen around this issue.  Wouldn't it be great to hang out with other people who "get it?"
results.name: In Defense of Circumcision

results.description:
Truth: Everyone has the ability to funny - It's just a matter of embracing your inner comedian.

Whether you've thought about pursuing comedy in the past or just need a place to run a new routine, this group is for those interested in practicing the art of standup or sketch comedy in a carefree, supportive environment. 

How it works: 

Every other week, we'll meet at a designated practice space with a stage. Each member will have an allotted 4 min slot to try out their routine or sketch on stage, and then we'll spend 2-3 mins providing feedback as a group. New to comedy? No problem! Use your stage time to run potential jokes/ideas by the group or just sit and watch. No judgement, no requirements, open to all. 

In addition to bi-weekly practice sessions, this group will also include: 

- Joke/sketch writing workshops
- Q&A sessions with seasoned comedians
- A weekly email blast of local open mic opportunities
- Group outings to local comedy events

About me / why I started this group: 

I'm a web developer by day and a comedy Junkie by night. I've spent most of my life struggling with depression and trying nearly every treatment path under the sun ranging from therapy, diet changes, routine exercise, prescriptions etc.. All to no avail. It wasn't until this past year, when I developed an interest in stand up comedy, that I finally started to embrace my cynicism and accept my depression for what it is, leading me to discover a new side of myself - my inner funny. I started doing open mics (despite my horrific stage freight) and was thrilled to find that I could make others laugh just by being myself; by opening up about the insecurities that have drug me down for years. Now, with this group, I hope to help others find the same sense of freedom and self worth that I found myself by creating a fun, safe environment reserved for comedic exploration.
results.name: Find Your Funny: NYC Amateur Comedians

results.description:
SKATEROBICS™ – Roller Skating Center in Brooklyn New York

Why is SKATEROBICS™ so awesome? Anyone who has ever tried it will say that it isn’t just one thing, but a variety of things that we do that make our classes so great.

Hi, my name is Tanya Dean, the founder of SKATEROBICS™. I’m here to help you kickstart your health and fitness goals with my new exciting program. I am a retired NYC Department of Correction Captain a two-time Daily News Golden Glove Boxing Champion and a Personal Trainer/Group Fitness Instructor.. I know how important overall health and well-being is and I want to help you achieve your skating goals. I started SKATEROBICS™ in April 2010 to help others improve their lifestyle in a healthy but exhilarating new way. Since then,SKATEROBICS™ has continued to grow as we help our members achieve their fitness success.

My roller skating center in Brooklyn, NY, offers something extraordinary that you will not find anywhere else. We provide exciting classes that you will find unique and amazing. Our exhilarating classes are unlike anything you will ever find in New York or elsewhere.    


SKATEROBICS™ at Brooklyn NYC Sports Center

At our Brooklyn Sports/Recreation Centers, we have many different classes to choose from. From beginner to intermediate to advanced, our classes are designed to meet your personal fitness level. No matter if you’re a beginner skater, or a pro, we at SKATEROBICS™ have something for everyone. At the Brooklyn Sports Center, we have beginner classes that are designed to help you develop your roller skating skills, and we have more advanced and dance roller skates classes. SKATEROBICS™ offers something for everyone at any age and any skill level.

I have years of experience helping people from all walks of life achieve their fitness goals. I work with all people to help them develop positive and empowering healthy lifestyle habits. I thrive on helping everyone that I work with feel good about themselves and work towards developing a positive perspective on life through exercise.

I believe that everyone needs to develop positive lifestyle habits. My roller skating programs are designed to focus on the workout as well as developing healthy overall lifestyle habits that will become part of your everyday life. Once you learn the basics, you can use the information gained to continue to grow and thrive. I can help you succeed with my program. I guarantee you that SKATEROBICS™ is a unique and dynamic experience that will change your life!

SKATEROBICS™ motto is

“For Health’s Sake….Roller Skate.”

results.description:
Hi ladies!

I'm a brand new resident of NYC and am looking to meet new girlfriends! I'm so excited to live here and explore what this beautiful city has to offer and looking to make some really great long-term friendships in the process. I'm really into dining out (I'm a huge foodie), film/television, travel, fashion, theater, outdoor activities and my two super adorable dogs.

results.description: I'm 34 and single. Most of my friends are coupled. I love them, but I'd also love to meet a bunch of ladies in the same boat as me. I know we're out there, after reading Rebecca Traister's book! This isn't for dating at all. Just for making friends. LGBTIQA welcome!
results.name: All the Single Ladies!

results.description: Photography group for beginners and serious amateurs who have a passion for photography and want to share their skills and learn from others. New York City has it all - great opportunities for street photography, fashion, portraiture, events and of course studio photography. We will also bring an international dimension to the group through our interaction with other photography groups in London, Paris, Rome, Buenos Aires and Havana.
results.name: New York City - Photography Meetup Group
